structure.unit: Regulation Of Trade And Certain Enterprises

law.catch_line: Review Of Refusal To Grant Or Renew License Or Revocation Or Suspension
law.text: [ Text of section effective until August 1, 2012. Repealed by 2012, 106, Sec. 4. See 2012, 106, Sec. 9.] Any person who is aggrieved by the refusal of the commissioner of education to grant or renew a license under section twenty-one B or by the revocation or suspension of a license granted under said section shall be entitled to have such refusal, revocation or suspension reviewed by a justice of the superior court, whose decision shall be final. Such review shall be in accordance with the standards of review provided in paragraph (8) of section fourteen of chapter thirty A.
